verses.roman:
evaṁ strītvam anuprāptaḥ
sudyumno mānavo nṛpaḥ
sasmāra sa kulācāryaṁ
vasiṣṭham iti śuśruma

synonyms: evam—in this way; strītvam—femininity; anuprāptaḥ—having achieved in that way; sudyumnaḥ—the male named Sudyumna; mānavaḥ—the son of Manu; nṛpaḥ—the king; sasmāra—remembered; saḥ—he; kula-ācāryam—the familial spiritual master; vasiṣṭham—the most powerful Vasiṣṭha; iti śuśruma—I have heard it (from reliable sources).
translation: I heard from reliable sources that King Sudyumna, the son of Manu, having thus achieved femininity, remembered his familial spiritual master, Vasiṣṭha.
